item.description:
Join us for a weeknight dinner @ Marina Bay in Quincy. While the restaurants have outdoor seating, as a larger group we will be seated inside. However, we will still have a view of the Marina and the Boston Skyline. Marina Bay restaurants are not cheap but we will not be going to the most expensive restaurant either. Appetizers start around $4 and entrees range from $8-$15 and up. The food is delicious and the atmosphere can't be beat on a nice summer night. Please join us for Dinner @ Marina Bay!

Thursday, August 9th @ 6:30pm
Skyline Restaurant
Marina Bay
North Quincy, MA

Event Fee: $2pp
Min/Max: Max of 16 people.
RSVP Deadline: 4pm on Wednesday, August 8th (Please Note: We need to confirm with the restaurant 24 hours in advance. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer prior to the event and could be considered a no-show if the Event Organizer and/or Group Organizer is not notified directly.)
Event Organizer: Angela
Meeting Place: In front of the chosen restaurant.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions:

From the North: Take Route 93S to exit 12 on to Route 3A South towards Quincy. Go Â½ mile passing over the Neponset Bridge. After the bridge go to 2nd set of lights, take a right onto Commander Shea Blvd. Follow signs to Marina Bay. At Marina Bay, restaurants are straight ahead on Boardwalk overlooking Marina.

From the South: Take Route 3N to Route 93N to exit 11 (Granite Ave). Go North towards Dorchester/Boston. Go to the 2nd light, take a right onto Hilltop St. Hilltop might become Hallet St. Follow to the next light, (Toyota on right) and turn right. Go to the first light, and take a right going over Neponset Bridge. After the bridge go to 2nd set of lights, take a right onto Commander Shea Blvd. Follow signs to Marina Bay. At Marina Bay, restaurants are straight ahead on Boardwalk overlooking Marina.

You may also want to try mapquest.com.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Weeknight Dinner @ Marina Bay
